channel.title: Vestibule :: Suggestions for "Mantri JS Dependency System Extraordinaire"
channel.description: A list of all suggestions made for "Mantri JS Dependency System Extraordinaire"

item.title: Suggestion from Nikos Dimitrakopoulos (@)
item.description:
Could you clarify how this relates to ruby? From what I understand it applies to rails applications and asset pipeline, right?

P.S.: Thanks for removing the link :)

item.title: Suggestion from Nikos Dimitrakopoulos (@)
item.description: Can you please remove the link to the slides which also reveal your identity? If someone wants to find out will be able to do so anyway through the project page :)
